GSD.product_version: versions from v4.6 to before v6.0.16
GSD.description:
cxl: fix possible null-ptr-deref in cxl_guest_init_afu|adapter()

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v6.0.16 by commit b32559ee4e6667c5c3daf4ec5454c277d1f255d2, it was introduced in version v4.6 by commit 14baf4d9c739e6e69150512d2eb23c71fffcc192. For more details please see the references link.
